page.title: 14WALTHAM ABBEY CHURCH
page.content:
{The Church of Waltham Holy Cross And {St. Lawrence ,}was named after a holy cross that was brought from Somerset
The nave and aisles of the present church date from{1120- 1130;}the West tower{1556;}and the charnel guild chapel was added in the{14th century. The present vicar of the church is the {Reverend Colin}Travers.He has been the vicar since{July 14th, 1982. {Â£500,000}is needed for{restoration}of the church - up to the present time just over Â£150,000 has been raised. In one year there are approximately{90 {weddings; between 120-150 funeral {services; and 50-60 baptisms in the {church. }The church is involved with the organization of many clubs - the {mother and toddler group; pathfinders {(10-14 yr.olds); 14-18 youth group; {bellringers;choir; and Sunday School.
